15029168591938132453.Text: Foyadas are valleys made by lava from Red Mountain. Foyada Mamamea is very old, very easily recognized. An old Dwemer bridge crosses the foyada near Fort Moonmoth.

1240554812595227952.Text: Foyada Mamaea is a volcanic ravine that runs from the top of Red Mountain southwest to its end just below Balmora. An old Dwemer bridge crosses the foyada near Fort Moonmoth. The best route to Ghostgate is to follow Foyada Mamaea up from where the Pelagiad-Balmora road crosses the foyada southeast of Fort Moonmoth.
